intro.p: The GStreamer team is proud to announce a new release in the ABI-stable 0.6.x series.
This release is a service release, fixing some small outstanding issues and versioning the binaries so that parallel installability of the 0.6.x with future series is fixed.

issues.issue: You need to manually migrate your GConf settings from /system/gstreamer to /system/gstreamer/0.6
